issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h5.Description 

If a titanium cli command plugin errors on load, the titanium cli will error as it is trying to access a property of an undefined object

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Download this repo https://github.com/ewanharris/TIMOB-24546
# Add the command to the ti config -a <path_to_repo>
# Run ti -h

h5.Actual

titanium cli errors

h5.Expected

titanium cli should not error
fields.summary: CLI: Error thrown if CLI command plugin errors on load
